Name: Increasing the fees charged for applications filed with the board of standards and appeals.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing the fees charged for applications filed with the board of standards and appeals.

History.Description: This Introduction was Signed Into Law by Mayor

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:


Section 1.  Subdivisions 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5 of section 25-202 of the administrative code of the city of New York, as renumbered and amended by local law number 59 for the year 1991, are amended to read as follows:

1.	Zoning variances and special permits. Application for any variance and special permit under the zoning resolution with respect to:	 		
a.	(1)	Individually owned one and two family dwellings	$275.00		
	(2)	Individually owned three family dwellings	[$340.00]	$425.00	
	(3) 	Group developments of one, two and three family dwellings	[480.00]	$600.00	
b.	Other buildings and structures (fee schedule applicable to square footage involved in application):			
	(1)	10,000 square feet or less of floor area	[$1,265.00]	$1,581.00	
	(2)	In excess of 10,000 but not more than 20,000 square feet of floor area.	[$1,755.00]	$2,194.00	
	(3) 	In excess of 20,000 but not more than [70,000] 40,000 square feet of floor area	[$2,250.00]	$2,813.00	
	(4)	In excess of 40,000 but not more than 70,000 square feet of floor area	[$2,740.00]	$3,425.00	
	(5)	In excess of 70,000 but not more than 100,000 square feet of floor area	[$3,230.00]	$4,038.00	
	(6)	In excess of 100,000 square feet of floor area	[3.25%] 4.0% of square footage in units of 10,000 square feet		
c.	Junk yards, parking lots, automotive service stations and other similar uses: 			
	(1)	10,000 square feet or less of lot area 	[$1,125.00]	$1,406.00	
	(2)	In excess of 10,000 but not more than [40,000] 20,000 square feet of lot area.	[$1,615.00]	$2,019.00	
	(3)	In excess of 20,000 but not more than 40,000 square feet of lot area	[$2,110.00]	$2,638.00	
	(4)	In excess of 40,000 but not more than 70,000 square feet of lot area	[$2,600.00]	$3,250.00	
	(5)	In excess of 70,000 but not more than 100,000 square feet of lot area 	[$3,090.00]	$3,863.00	
	(6)	In excess of 100,000 square feet of lot area 	[$3,585.00]	$4,481.00	
d.	Application for any zoning variance or special permit under the zoning resolution not subject to paragraph a, b, or c of this subdivision 	[$1,265.00] 	$1,581.00	
2.	Special order calendar. 			
a.	Application to reopen an application pursuant to the board's rules or procedure 	[$985.00]	$1,231.00	
b.	Application for amendment of variance or special permit previously granted under subparagraphs one and two of paragraph a of subdivision one of this section 	$350.00		
c.	Application for amendment of variance or special permit previously granted under [sub-paragraph] subparagraph three of paragraph a of subdivision one of this section 	[$490.00]	$613.00	
d.	Application for amendment of variance or special permit previously granted under paragraph b, c or d of subdivision one of this section 	[$1,125.00]	$1,406.00	
e.	Application for an extension of time in which to comply with the conditions imposed in the previous resolution of the board of standards and appeals 	[$775.00]	$969.00	
f.	Application for an extension of time to complete construction pursuant to section 72-23 or 73-70 of the zoning resolution of the city 	[$775.00]	$969.00	
g.	Application to waive the board's rules of procedure when:			
	(1) 	Application to extend time to complete construction is filed one year or less after the permitted filing period 	[$350.00]	$438.00	
	(2) 	Application to extend time to complete construction is filed more than one year [or less] after the permitted filing period 	[$490.00]	$613.00	
	(3)	Application to extend the term of a previously issued variance or special permit or appeal is filed one year or less [before or] after the permitted filing period 	[$630.00]	$788.00	
	(4)	Application to extend the term of a previously issued variance or special permit or appeal is filed more than one year [or less] before or after the permitted filing period 	[$985.00]	$1,231.00	
h.	Application for extension of the term of a variance or special permit previously issued pursuant to subdivision one of this section 			
	(1)	For such variance or special permit issued pursuant to paragraph a of such subdivision 	[$350.00] 	$438.00	
	(2)	For such variance or special permit issued pursuant to subparagraph one of paragraph b of such subdivision 	[$1,265.00] 	$1,581.00	
	(3)	For such variance or special permit issued pursuant to subparagraph two of paragraph b of such subdivision 	[$1,755.00] 	$2,194.00	
	(4)	For such variance or special permit issued pursuant to subparagraph three of paragraph b of such subdivision 	[$2,250.00] 	$2,813.00	
	(5)	For such variance or special permit issued pursuant to subparagraph four of paragraph b of such subdivision 	[$2,740.00] 	$3,425.00	
	(6)	For such variance or special permit issued pursuant to subparagraph five of paragraph b of such subdivision 	[$3,230.00] 	$4,038.00	
	(7)	For such variance or special permit issued pursuant to subparagraph six of paragraph b of such subdivision 	[3.25%] 4.0% of square footage in units of 10,000 square feet		
	(8)	For such variance or special permit issued pursuant to subparagraph one of paragraph c of such subdivision 	[$1,125.00]	$1,406.00	
	(9)	For such variance or special permit issued pursuant to subparagraph two of paragraph c of such subdivision 	[$1,615.00]	$2,019.00	
	(10)	For such variance or special permit issued pursuant to subparagraph three of paragraph c of such subdivision 	[$2,110.00]	$2,638.00	
	(11)	For such variance or special permit issued pursuant to subparagraph four of paragraph c of such subdivision 	[$2,600.00]	$3,250.00	
	(12)	For such variance or special permit issued pursuant to subparagraph five of paragraph c of such subdivision 	[$3,090.00]	$3,863.00	
	(13)	For such variance or special permit issued pursuant to subparagraph six of paragraph c of such subdivision 	[$3,585.00]	$4,481.00	
	(14)	For such variance or special permit issued pursuant to paragraph d of such subdivision 	[$1,265.00]	$1,581.00	
3.	Administrative appeals. 			
a.	Appeals from or application for review of any order, requirement or determination of the commissioner of buildings or of any borough superintendent of buildings of the department of buildings or of the fire commissioner or any rule or regulation or amendment or repeal thereof made by the fire commissioner or the commissioner of [ports, international trade and commerce] small business services with respect to:			
	(1)	One, two and three family residences 	$630.00		
	(2)	All other residences 	[$985.00]	$1,231.00	
	(3)	All other buildings and properties 	[$1,265.00]	$1,581.00	
b.	Application for amendment of prior approval of appeals from or application for review of any order, requirement or determination of the commissioner of buildings or of any borough superintendent of buildings of the department of buildings or of the fire commissioner or any rule or regulation or amendment or repeal thereof made by the fire commissioner or the commissioner of [ports, international trade and commerce] small business services with respect to one, two and three family residences, all other residences and all other buildings and properties 	[$490.00]	$613.00	
4.[a.	Application for an administrative review under the loft conversion provisions of the zoning resolution of the city 	$ 775.00 plus $0.03 for each square foot of floor area excluding the cellar		
b.]	Application for the reinstatement of a building permit pursuant to section 15-013 of the zoning resolution of the city	[$985.00]	$1,231.00	
5.	Application for extension of period to complete construction pursuant to sections 11-32 and 11-33 of the zoning resolution of the city 	[$1,125.00] 	$1,406.00	

	Â§2. This local shall take effect immediately.
